cause.description:
Discuss issues such as Education, Health, War, etc. and how to go about changing America for the better.
1. Get Barack Obama Elected
2. The War in Iraq
3. Health Insurance
4. Darfur
5. Animal Cruelty
6. Job Opportunity
7. Repealing No Child Left Behind
cause.mission: Address the issues facing American's today!
cause.name: U.S. Politics
